name: Disorbit
description:
Disorbit - As your spaceship malfunctions, you make way to the cockpit to take control.  This was made for the OneMinJam, the theme of the jam is that the game must last close to one minute as much as possible.

If the web player lags, try downloading the game.

Controls : Left/Right & Mouse (Look)




Controls : Left/Right & Mouse (Look)
